ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: We thank A. Richard from the “Centre de Microscopie Electronique” of the University of Orléans for assistance in SEM data acquisition. This work was supported by a grant of the Romanian Ministry of Research and Innovation, CCCDI-UEFISCDI, through the project “Improvement of Life Quality by Developing new Technologies Based on Efficient Nanoparticles in Water and Soil Decontamination-PN-III-P1-1.2-PCCDI-2017-0134”, Contract Nr. 23PCCDI/2018.
